name: PresentationOptions
shortdesc: Options for the PDF presentation command.

property.name: presentation
property.shortdesc: If true, the file type is presentation. If false, the file type is Multi-Page document.

property.name: autoAdvance
property.shortdesc: If true, the presentation auto advances.

property.name: interval
property.shortdesc: The amount of time (in seconds) before auto advancing the view. Valid only when 'auto advance' is true. Range: 1 to 60.

property.name: loop
property.shortdesc: If true, the presentation loops after the last page.

property.name: magnification
property.shortdesc: The magnification type when viewing the image.

property.name: includeFilename
property.shortdesc: If true, includes the file name for the image.

property.name: PDFFileOptions
property.shortdesc: Options for creating the PDF file.
